segments.text: So do you think I can take it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d stay over there , if I were in your shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but things are getting a bit out of hand and I just can ’ t do nothing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See your problem ? You get so restless when it ’ s time to calm down .
segments.speaker: S2
